org.jpaste.pastebin.account

Class PastebinAccountDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpaste.pastebin.account.PastebinAccountDetails

  • public class PastebinAccountDetails
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds information and settings of a pastebin account.
    Author:
    Brian B
